description: Add favicon.ico and Apple touch icons to the site. The <head> section already has meta tags for Open Graph and Twitter but lacks basic browser/tab icons.
summary: Add favicon.ico and Apple touch icons to improve browser tab display and bookmark appearance. The site is a simple static HTML site with existing Open Graph meta tags - this adds the missing browser icon support.

phases.name: Asset Generation
phases.description: Generate favicon and touch icon assets from existing profile image or create new icons

subtasks.title: Generate favicon.ico
subtasks.description: Create a multi-resolution favicon.ico file (16x16, 32x32, 48x48) for browser tabs. Use ImageMagick or similar to generate from profile image or create a simple icon.
subtasks.notes: Generated multi-resolution favicon.ico (16x16, 32x32, 48x48) using custom Python script with struct module. File verified with 3 icons.

subtasks.title: Generate Apple touch icon (180x180)
subtasks.description: Create the primary Apple touch icon PNG file at 180x180 pixels. This is the recommended size for modern iOS devices and appears when users save the site to their home screen.
subtasks.notes: Generated 180x180 Apple touch icon PNG using custom Python script. Created professional gradient design with centered circle badge. File verified as valid PNG (9.5KB).

subtasks.title: Generate PNG favicons (32x32 and 16x16)
subtasks.description: Create separate PNG favicons for browsers that prefer PNG over ICO format (Chrome, Firefox, Safari).
subtasks.notes: Generated favicon-32x32.png (32x32, 324 bytes) and favicon-16x16.png (16x16, 198 bytes) using custom Python script with struct and zlib modules. Both files verified as valid PNG images with correct dimensions.

phases.name: HTML Integration
phases.description: Add the favicon and touch icon link tags to the HTML head section

subtasks.title: Add favicon and touch icon link tags to index.html
subtasks.description: Add <link rel='icon'> and <link rel='apple-touch-icon'> tags to the <head> section, following the existing meta tag pattern. Place after Twitter meta tags, before Fonts section.
subtasks.notes: Added favicon and apple-touch-icon link tags to index.html <head> section. Placed after Twitter meta tags, before Fonts section. All four icon files referenced with relative paths (./images/...) following existing pattern.

phases.name: Verification
phases.description: Verify all icons are properly added and accessible

subtasks.title: Verify icon files and HTML syntax
subtasks.description: Confirm all favicon and touch icon files exist in the images/ directory, are valid image files with correct dimensions, and the HTML link tags have proper syntax.
subtasks.notes: Verified all favicon and touch icon files exist, are valid images with correct dimensions (favicon.ico: 16x16/32x32/48x48, apple-touch-icon.png: 180x180, favicon-32x32.png: 32x32, favicon-16x16.png: 16x16), and HTML link tags have proper syntax. All final acceptance criteria met. Verification report created.

final_acceptance: favicon.ico exists in images/ directory with multiple resolutions
index.html contains proper link tags for all icons
All link tags use correct relative paths

qa_status.tests_passed: N/A - Static HTML site (no automated test suite)

validation_summary.icon_files_validated: All 4 icon files present and valid
validation_summary.html_integration: All link tags properly formatted and positioned
